content: sts single_crochet in each of the next 16 sts ch5 arm hole made skp 8 sts single_crochet in each of the remaining 8 sts turn 32sts & 2 ch5 sps row 6 ch1 half_double_crochet in next 8 sts 6hdc in ch5 space half_double_crochet in each of the next 16 sts 6hdc in ch5 space half_double_crochet in each of the remaining 8 sts turn 44sts row 7 ch1 *half_double_crochet in next 10 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 48sts row 8 ch1 half_double_crochet in each st across turn 48sts row 9 & 10 ch1 single_crochet in each st across turn 48sts fasten_off and hide loose ends sleeves round 1 attach yarn under the arm in centre of the 6hdc s work 20 single_crochet evenly around the arm join last st to first with a slip_stitch 20sts round 2 ch1 hdc2tog work half_double_crochet in each of next 16 sts hdc2tog join last st to first with a slip_stitch 18sts round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st around join last st to first with a slip_stitch 18sts rounds 4 & 5 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join last st to first with a slip_stitch 18sts slip_stitch loosely around to neaten and then fasten_off and hide loose ends hood attach yarn at right hand side looking at the back of the jacket row 1 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st across turn 24sts row 2 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 3 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 30sts row 3 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 4 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 36sts row 4 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 5 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 42sts row 5 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 6 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 48sts row 6 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 7 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 54sts row 7 ch1 *half_double_crochet into each of next 8 sts 2hdc in next st repeat from * across turn 60sts row 8 - 10 ch1 half_double_crochet into each st across turn 60sts row 11 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 28 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 28 sts turn 58sts row 12 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 27 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 27 sts turn 56sts row 13 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 26 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 26 sts turn 54sts row 14 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 25 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 25 sts turn 52sts row 15 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 24 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 24 sts turn 50sts row 16 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 23 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 23 sts turn 48sts row 17 ch1 work half_double_crochet into next 22 sts hdc2tog x 2 half_double_crochet into remaining 22 sts turn 46sts row 18
